channel.title: I am wondering a question for the command ::yell
channel.description:
is there a way, ok since i am owner of my server, if i use ::yell instead of saying k0 gawd k0: hello
it will say [owner]k0 gawd k0 - hello? i just want it like that please help.

item.title: I am wondering a question for the command ::yell
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

there is a way to and i would like to know to but idk how

Read full topic
